channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery

item.title: Magnetic nanoparticles fight bone cancer and help healing
item.description: Researchers have developed a magnetic nanomaterial that can kill bone cancer cells and support bone regeneration at the same time. The material heats ...

item.title: Japanese scientists just built human brain circuits in the lab

item.title: Breakthrough lets scientists watch plants breathe in real time

item.title: A global cancer surge is underway and the world is not ready
item.description: Global cancer cases have surged dramatically, doubling since 1990 and reaching 18.5 million new diagnoses in 2023. Deaths have also climbed to over 10...
